Verses: 1 aiyo! Janamperuththa Nagari Thanimaiyaaga Utkaarndhirukkiraale! Vidhavaikku Oppaanaale! Jaadhigalil Periyavalum, Seemaigalil Naayagiyumaayirundhaval Kappankattugiravalaanaale!

2 raakkaalaththile Azhudhukondirukkiraal, Avaludaiya Kanneer Aval Kannangalil Vadigiradhu; Avaludaiya Nesar Ellaarukkullum Avalaith Thetruvaar Oruvarum Illai; Avaludaiya Snegidhar Ellaarum Avalukkuth Dhrogigalum Saththurukkalumaanaargal.

3 yoodhaa Janangal Ubaththiravappadavum, Kodumaiyaana Adimaivelaiseyyavum Siraippattupponaargal. Aval Purajaadhigalukkulle Thangugiraal, Ilaippaarudhal Adaiyaal; Avalaith Thunbappaduththugira Yaavarum Idukkamaana Idangalile Thodarndhupidiththaargal.

4 pandigaikku Varuvaar Illaadhadhinaal, Seeyonukkup Pogira Vazhigal Pulambugiradhu; Aval Vaasalgal Ellaam Paazhaaikkidakkiradhu; Aval Aasaariyargal Thavikkiraargal; Aval Kannigaigal Sanjalappadugiraargal; Avalukkuk Kasappe Undaayirukkiradhu.

5 aval Saththurukkal Thalaimaiyaanaargal; Aval Pagaignar Sugiththirukkiraargal; Avaludaiya Thiralaana Paadhagangalinimiththam Karththar Avalai Sanjalappaduththinaar; Aval Pillaigal Saththuruvukku Munbaaga Siraippattupponaargal.
6 seeyon Kumaaraththiyin Azhagellaam Avalai Vittuppoyitru; Aval Prabukkal Meychchalaik Kaanaadha Maangalukku Oppaagi, Thodarugiravanukku Munbaaga Saththuvamillaamal Nadandhu Ponaargal.

7 thanakku Sirumaiyum Thavippum Undaagiya Naatkalile Erusalem Poorvanaatkal Mudharkondu Thanakku Undaayirundha Inbamaanavaigalaiyellaam Ninaikkiraal; Avalukku Udhaviseyvaar Illaamal Avaludaiya Janangal Saththuruvin Kaiyile Vizhugaiyil, Pagaignar Avalaip Paarththu, Avaludaiya Oivunaatkalaik Kuriththup Pariyaasampanninaargal.

8 erusalem Migudhiyaaip Paavancheydhaal; Aadhalaal Dhoorasthreeyaippolaanaal; Avalaik Ganampanninavargal Ellaarum Avalai Asattaippannugiraargal; Avaludaiya Maanaththaik Kandaargal; Avalum Perumoochchuvittup Pinnittuth Thirumbinaal.

9 avaludaiya Asoosam Aval Vasthira Orangalil Irundhadhu; Thanakku Varappogira Mudivai Ninaiyaadhirundhaal; Aagaiyaal Adhisayamaaith Thaazhththappattupponaal; Thetruvaar Illai; Karththaave, En Sirumaiyaip Paarum; Pagaignan Perumaibaaraattinaane.

10 avaludaiya Inbamaana Ellaavatrinmelum Saththuru Than Kaiyai Neettinaan; Ummudaiya Sabaiyile Varalaagaadhendru Dhevareer Vilakkiya Purajaadhiyaar Umadhu Parisuththa Sthalaththukkul Pravesiththadhaik Kandaal.

11 avaludaiya Janangalellaarum Appanthedith Thavikkiraargal; Thangal Uyiraik Kaappaatrath Thangaludaiya Inbamaanavaigalai Aagaaraththukkendru Koduththuvittaargal; Karththaave, Nokkippaarum; Ennamatravalaanene.

12 vazhiyil Nadandhupogira Sagala Janangale, Idhaikkuriththu Ungalukkuk Kavaiyillaiyaa (akkaraiyillaiyaa)? Karththar Thamadhu Ukkiramaana Kobamoonda Naalile Ennai Sanjalappaduththinadhinaal Enakku Undaana En Dhukkaththukku Sariyaana Dhukkam Undo Endru Ennai Nokkippaarungal.

13 uyaraththilirundhu En Elumbugalil Akkiniyai Anuppinaar, Adhu Avaigalil Patriyerigiradhu; En Kaalgalukku Valaiyai Veesinaar; Ennaip Pinnittu Vizhappanninaar; Ennaip Paazhaakkinaar; Niththam Naan Balatchayappattup Pogiren.

14 en Paadhagangalin Nugam Avarudaiya Kaiyaal Poottappattirukkiradhu; Avaigal Pinaikkappattu En Kazhuththai Sutrikkondadhu; En Belanai Vizhappanninaar; Naan Ezhundhirukkak Koodaadhapadikku Aandavar Ennai Odukkugiravargalin Kaiyil Oppukkoduththaar.

15 ennilulla Paraakkiramasaaligalaagiya Ennudaiyavargalellaaraiyum Aandavar Midhiththuppottaar; En Vaalibarai Norukkumpadi Enakku Virodhamaai Oru Koottaththai Varavazhaiththaar; Dhraatchappazhaththai Aalaiyil Midhikkiradhupola, Aandavar Yoodhaa Kumaaraththiyaagiya Kannigaiyai Midhiththaar.
16 ivaigalinimiththam Naan Azhugiren; En Kan, En Kanne Neeraai Sorigiradhu; En Uyiraik Kaappaatrith Thetrugiravar Ennai Vittu Dhooramaanaar; Pagaignan Merkondadhinaal En Pillaigal Paazhaaipponaargal.

17 seeyon Than Kaigalai Virikkiraal; Avalaith Thetruvaar Oruvarumillai; Karththar Yaakkobin Sutruppuraththaarai Avanukku Saththurukkalaagak Kattalaiyittaar; Avargalukkulle Erusalem Dhoora Sthreekku Oppaanaal.
18 karththar Needhiparar; Avarudaiya Vaakkukku Virodhamaai Naan Ezhumbinen; Janangale, Neengal Ellaarum Idhaik Kettu En Dhukkaththaip Paarungal; En Kannigaigalum En Vaalibarum Siraippattupponaargal.

19 ennai Snegiththavargalaik Kooppitten, Avargalo Ennai Mosam Pokkinaargal; En Aasaariyargalum En Mooppargalum Thangal Uyiraik Kaappaatrath Thangalukku Appanthedugaiyil Nagaraththil Moochchodungi Maandaargal.

20 karththaave, Paarum, Naan Nerukkappadugiren; En Kudal Kodhikkiradhu; Naan Kadundhrogampanninapadiyinaal En Irudhayam Viyaagulappadugiradhu; Veliyile Pattayam Ennaip Pillaiyatravalaakkitru, Veettukkulle Maranam Vandhirukkiradhu.

21 naan Thavikkiradhai Avargal Kettaalum Ennaith Thetruvaar Oruvarum Illai; En Pagaignar Ellaarum Enakku Vandha Aabaththaik Kettu, Dhevareer Adhai Seydhapadiyaal Sandhoshamaayirukkiraargal; Neer Koorina Naalai Varappannuveer, Appozhudhu Avargalum Ennaippolaavaargal.

22 avargaludaiya Pollaappellaam Umadhu Mugaththukku Munbaaga Varakkadavadhu. En Sagala Paadhagangalinimiththamum Neer Enakku Seydhadhupola Avargalukkum Seyyum; En Perumoochchugal Migudhiyaayina, En Irudhayam Balatchayamaayirukkiradhu.
